I recommend "Crazy, Stupid, Love." This romantic comedy follows the lives of a young man and his two love interests. It's a heartwarming story that will leave you feeling good about life.

Another recommendation is "Romance & Cigarettes." This musical tells the story of a husband who becomes infidel to his wife at a Chicago museum. It's an entertaining musical with catchy songs and lively performances.

Lastly, I recommend "The Relic." This science fiction film follows the story of a group of scientists who embark on a dangerous mission to destroy a South American lizard-lik God, who' s on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum. It's an exciting science fiction film with excellent special effects and thrilling action sequences.

In conclusion, I recommend "Crazy, Stupid, Love.", "Romance  & Cigarettes", "The Relic" to anyone interested in watching movies about love, conspiracy theories, and scientific adventures.

Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "The Messenger" and "Flags of Our Fathers". 

"The Messenger" is a movie about an American soldier who struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer. The movie is directed by Brendan Sexton III.

"Flags of Our Fathers" is a movie about the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II. The movie is directed by David Patrick Kelly.

Both "The Messenger" and "Flags of Our Fathers" are excellent movies with well-developed characters, compelling storylines, and stunning visuals.
